subject: fail() and message size
msgSnippet: When I call fail(), I provide a message that is fairly long.  Unfortuntely, this message doesn t completely print out.  There seems to be a limit to the
messageBody:
When I call fail(), I provide a message that is fairly long. Unfortuntely,
this message doesn't completely print out. There seems to be a limit to the
message length. Can I change this limit? If not, is there a place I could
get the entire message?

Thanks.

Scott
